response.original_title: Wonderful World of Disney 40 Years of Television Magic
response.overview: Michael Eisner opens our look at some of the Greatest Disney Moments in Television History.  We star by going back to the simple days, when television had only 3 channels and it was in black and white, and Sunday Night meant Disney.  Kirstie Alley is our host for our trip down memory lane.  The all-star cast includes, Debbie Allen, Bobby Burgess,  Margaret Cho, Roy Disney, George Forman, Tom hanks, Hugh Hefner, John Hench, Billy Joel, Elton John, Ollie Johnston and Ward Kimball.
response.title: Wonderful World of Disney 40 Years of Television Magic
